name: Abdelmounaam Rezgui
content: Dr. Abdelmounaam Rezgui: New Mexico Tech Skip to main content Abdelmounaam Rezgui, PhD Research Assistant Professor Computer Science & Engineering rezgui@cs.nmt.edu 575 - 835 - 6036 Cramer 224 Research Areas Big Data Data Analytics Cloud Computing I am an assistant professor in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at New Mexico Tech where I am also the Director of the Cloud Computing and Big Data (C2BD) Lab. I received my Ph. D. from Virginia Tech. My research aims at developing techniques to make cloud platforms more efficient and, in particular, Iam exploring new approaches to make cloud platforms support big data applications more efficiently Tags: computer engineering assistant professor Computer Science faculty ©
